tool_description: Generates comprehensive care and maintenance instructions based on fiber properties and project characteristics.

fiber_composition.description: List of fibers in the yarn or fabric

item_type.description: Type of finished item (clothing, accessory, home_textile, delicate_item)

construction_method.description: How item was made (knitted, woven, crocheted, felted)

error_messages: Unknown fiber type: All fibers in composition must be recognized fiber types (wool, cotton, silk, linen, alpaca, cashmere, mohair, polyester, nylon, acrylic, etc.).
Invalid item type: Item type must be one of: clothing, accessory, home_textile, or delicate_item.
Unsupported construction method: Construction method must be one of: knitted, woven, crocheted, or felted.
usage: Provide fiber_composition as an array of fiber types, specify item_type and construction_method. The tool generates detailed care instructions appropriate for the fiber combination and item characteristics.

washing_instructions.description: Detailed washing guidelines including temperature and method

storage_recommendations.description: How to store the item properly

special_precautions.description: Important warnings and special care notes

frequency_guidelines.description: How often the item should be cleaned or maintained

care_difficulty.description: Overall care complexity (easy, moderate, high_maintenance, professional_only)
